title: Hearts of Iron IV / Hearts of Iron 4 (2016) [Ru/Multi] (1.5.4/dl
description:
Release date: June 6, 2016
Genre: Strategy (Real-time, Grand strategy), 3D
Official website: link

Developer: Paradox Development Studios
Publisher: Paradox Interactive
Release Date: xatab

Interface language: Russian, English and other
Location: Paradox Development Studios
Version: 1.5.4
Publication Type: Repack

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 +
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 2.66 GHz
RAM: 4 GB
Graphics Card: DirectX 9
Disk space: 2 GB

Tablet: Wash (CODEX)

Description:
The plot of the game is dedicated to the events of the Second World War. Through an isometric perspective and a strategic world map gamers in any way try to lead the chosen state to a one hundred percent victory; control the troops (aviation, fleet, armored vehicles, infantry), conduct diplomatic talks and carry out various combat missions.

Additions:
Hearts of Iron IV: German Historical Portraits
Hearts of Iron IV: Poland - United and Ready
Hearts of Iron IV: Rocket Launcher Unit Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: Allied Radio Music Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: German March Order Music Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: British Tanks Unit Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: US Tanks Unit Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: Soviet Tanks Unit Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: Heavy Cruisers Unit Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: French Tanks Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: German Tanks Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: War Stories
Hearts of Iron IV: Together for Victory
Hearts of Iron IV: Anniversary Pack
Hearts of Iron IV: Death or Dishonor
Hearts of Iron IV: Wallpaper
Hearts of Iron IV: Artbook
Hearts of Iron IV: Sabaton Soundtrack
Hearts of Iron IV: Sabaton Soundtrack Vol. 2
Hearts of Iron IV: Waking the Tiger
